page.title: 20INDUSTRY NEAR COATBRIDGE
page.content:
The{Air Products Depot}has been in {Bargeddie}since{1940.}It is owned by an{American Company}and is a{depot}for a{variety of gas cylinders products which are sent to{works and hospitals throughout the{Glasgow and Lanarkshire {area. They employ{forty_five workers}who all stay within{two miles}of the {factory.}The company has had{one {accident.}It was a{fire explosion}in a {dock}that no longer exists. It has only been broken into a few times. Gases like oxygen,oxygen_helium,and mixed gases for welding applications are supplied by AIR PRODUCTS.
These entries have been compiled by the Primary VI/VII class of Bargeddie Primary School,Coatbridge Road, Bargeddie,Glasgow.
